author: carsten-riedel
body:
### Summary of the new feature / enhancement

As a user i want to schedule a job in the windows task scheduler, that repeats on a more frequent basis that a daily schedule.

### Proposed technical implementation details (optional)

New-ScheduledTaskTrigger
   [-RandomDelay < TimeSpan >]
   -At <DateTime>
   [-DaysOfWeek < DayOfWeek[] >]
   [-Weekly]
   [-WeeksInterval < UInt32 >]
   [-CimSession < CimSession[] >]
   [-ThrottleLimit < Int32 >]
   [-AsJob]
   [< CommonParameters >]

Please add the following parameters to set the advanced setting

[-RepeatTask < TimeSpan >]
[-RepeatDuration < TimeSpan >]
